descriptor.name: Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY) Facilitator
descriptor.short_desc: Training to promote institutional deliveries among pregnant women by facilitating JSY benefits.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This course provides detailed information on Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY), a safe motherhood intervention under the National Health Mission (NHM). Agents will learn to identify eligible pregnant women, explain the cash assistance benefits, and coordinate with ASHA workers and health facilities.
